name: Travel Planner & Journal - Notion Template
description: Plan out your trips, create your bucket list, document your travel, and more with this simple Notion page.Don't leave your travels up to chance. This template will help you organize and prepare for your upcoming trips so you can make them memorable. PLUS, use the Travel Journal section to document your experiences, memories, and more so you will remember your trip for years to come. This template includesA full travel planner with an itinerary, expense tracker, document storage, reading list, to
features: Afull travel plannerwith an itinerary, expense tracker, document storage, reading list, to-do list, packing list, and more!; Atravel journalwith prompts so you can document your travels.; Abucket listso you can list out everywhere you want to go.
